abstract.description:
The configuration file used in RECO data processing step.

This file describes the exact setup for the CMS software executable which was used in a data-processing step. It is provided only for information purposes. Although all the components required to analyse the public primary datasets - such as corresponding input data, condition data, software version - are provided on this portal, it is not necessarily possible to reproduce all the described data-processing steps.

title: Configuration file for RECO step reco_HIRun2011
